metadata.title: CVE-2018-19516 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: messagepartthemes/default/defaultrenderer.cpp in messagelib in KDEApplications before 18.12.0 does not properly restrict the handling of anhttp-equiv="REFRESH" value.

criterions.comment: kf5-messagelib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
